ComicInfo.Summary:
It is the final confrontation between the alien invader P:andora and the surviving members of Project Superpowers. Can they make one last stand? Do a sense of hope and true heroes still exist in this world? Or will all life on planet Earth be a thing of the past?
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Cover A | Francesco Mattina | 1 | B | Cover B | Ed Benes | 2 | C | Cove C | John Royle | 3 | D | Cover D | Diego Galindo | 4 | E | Cover E | Stephen Segovia | 5 | F | Cover F | Sergio Davila | 6 | G/RI | 1:10 Retailer Incentive "Virgin Art" Edition Variant Cover | Francesco Mattina | 7 | H/RI | 1:20 Retailer Incentive "Black & White" Edition Variant Cover | Stephen Segovia | 8 | I/RI | 1:25 Retailer Incentive "Virgin Art" Edition Variant Cover | Ed Benes | 9 | J/RI | 1:30 Retailer Incentive "Virgin Art" Edition Variant Cover | Stephen Segovia | 10 |
